00035 
00036 bool FileExists(const char *filename)
00037 {
00038   struct stat st;
00039   return(stat(filename,&st) == 0);
00040 }

00044 ConfigReader::SubTree::SubTree(ConfigReader &c,const char *base_exp)
00045 {
00046   config = &c;
00047   base = base_exp;
00048   errors_at_init = config->errors;
00049 }
00050 
00051 ConfigReader::SubTree::SubTree(SubTree &s,const char *base_exp)
00052 {
00053   config = s.config;
00054   const char *sep = (base_exp[0]=='[')? "" : ".";
00055   base.printf("%s%s%s",s.base(),sep,base_exp);
00056   errors_at_init = config->errors;
00057 }
00058 
00059 const char *ConfigReader::SubTree::getFullExp(const char *exp)
00060 {
00061   const char *sep = (exp[0]=='[')? "" : ".";
00062   full.printf("%s%s%s",base(),sep,exp);
00063   return(full());
00064 }

00125 ConfigReader::FileHeader::FileHeader(const FileHeader &fh)
00126 {

00128   flags = fh.flags;

00134 ConfigReader::ConfigReader()
00135 {
00136   path = NULL;
00137   L = NULL;
00138   errors = 0;
00139   num_readfiles_calls = 0;
00140   watch_files = NULL;
00141   modified = false;
00142 }
00143 
00144 ConfigReader::ConfigReader(const char* _path)
00145 {
00146   path = (char*) malloc(strlen(_path)+1);
00147   strcpy(path,_path);
00148   L = NULL;
00149   errors = 0;
00150   num_readfiles_calls = 0;
00151   watch_files = NULL;
00152   modified = false;
00153 }

00155 bool ConfigReader::initLua()
00156 {
00157   if(L) closeLua();
00158   L = lua_open();
00159   if(!L) return(false);
00160 
00161   // load libraries
00162   luaL_openlibs(L);
00163 
00164   // discard any results from initialization
00165   lua_settop(L, 0);
00166 
00167   return(true);
00168 }
00169 
00170 void ConfigReader::closeLua()
00171 {
00172   if(L) lua_close(L);
00173   L = NULL;
00174 }
00175 
00176 void ConfigReader::clearWatches()
00177 {
00178   for(unsigned i=0; i<files.size(); i++){
00179     files[i].watch.remove();
00180   }
00181 }
00182 
00183 void ConfigReader::reset()
00184 {
00185   closeLua();
00186   clearWatches();
00187   files.clear();
00188   num_readfiles_calls = 0;
00189   watch_files = NULL;
00190 }
00191 
00192 void ConfigReader::addFile(const char *filename,unsigned flags)
00193 {
00194   FileHeader fh;
00195   if(path!=NULL){
00196     fh.filename = path;
00197     fh.filename.add(filename);
00198   }else{
00199     fh.filename = filename;
00200   }
00201   fh.flags = flags;
00202   fh.watch.watch(watch_files,filename);
00203   files.push_back(fh);
00204 
00205   modified = true;
00206 }
00207 
00208 void ConfigReader::showError(int err_code,const char *filename)
00209 {
00210   if(err_code == 0) return;
00211 
00212   AnsiColor::SetFgColor(stderr,AnsiColor::Yellow);
00213   AnsiColor::Bold(stderr);
00214 
00215   const char *err_str;
00216   switch(err_code){
00217     case LUA_ERRFILE:   err_str="File not found"; break;
00218     case LUA_ERRSYNTAX: err_str="Syntax error"; break;
00219     case LUA_ERRMEM:    err_str="Memory allocation error"; break;
00220     case LUA_ERRRUN:    err_str="Runtime error"; break;
00221     case LUA_ERRERR:    err_str="Error running error handler"; break;
00222     default: err_str="Uknown error";
00223   }
00224 
00225   int t = lua_gettop(L);
00226   if(lua_isstring(L,t)){
00227     const char *str = lua_tolstring(L,t,NULL);
00228     fprintf(stderr,"ConfigReader: %s\n",str);
00229   }
00230 
00231   fprintf(stderr,"ConfigReader: %s: %s\n",filename,err_str);
00232 
00233   AnsiColor::Reset(stderr);
00234 }
00235 
00236 bool ConfigReader::readFile(const char *filename,unsigned flags)
00237 {
00238   if(Debug){
00239     printf("ConfigReader: reading \"%s\"\n",filename);
00240   }
00241 
00242   // it's ok if optional files don't exist
00243   if((flags & Optional)!=0 && !FileExists(filename)) return(true);
00244 
00245   // try to load the file
00246   int ret = luaL_loadfile(L, filename);
00247   if(ret){
00248     showError(ret,filename);
00249   }else{
00250     // try to execute the file
00251     ret = lua_pcall(L, 0, LUA_MULTRET, 0);
00252     if(ret) showError(ret,filename);
00253   }
00254 
00255   lua_settop(L, 0); // discard any results
00256 
00257   return(ret == 0);
00258 }
00259 
00260 bool ConfigReader::readFiles()
00261 {
00262   if(!L && !initLua()) return(false);
00263   errors = 0;
00264   modified = false;
00265 
00266   bool ok = true;
00267 
00268   for(unsigned i=0; i<files.size(); i++){
00269     FileHeader &fh = files[i];
00270     if(fh.watch.isFileModified()){
00271       fh.watch.rewatch(fh.filename());
00272     }
00273     if(!readFile(fh.filename(),fh.flags)){
00274       ok = false;
00275     }
00276   }
00277 
00278   if(ok) num_readfiles_calls++;
00279 
00280   return(ok);
00281 }
00282 
00283 bool ConfigReader::isFileModified()
00284 {
00285   unsigned i=0;
00286   while(!modified && i<files.size()){
00287     modified = files[i].watch.isFileModified();
00288     i++;
00289   }
00290 
00291   return(modified);
00292 }
00293 
00294 bool ConfigReader::needUpdate(int &client_generation) const
00295 {
00296   if(client_generation != getGeneration()){
00297     client_generation = getGeneration();
00298     return(true);
00299   }else{
00300     return(false);
00301   }
00302 }

00304 void ConfigReader::eval(const char *exp)
00305 {
00306   CharString fexp;
00307   fexp.printf("_ans=(%s);",exp);
00308   luaL_dostring(L,fexp());
00309   lua_getglobal(L,"_ans");
00310 }
00311 
00312 void ConfigReader::eval(const char *exp0,const char *exp1)
00313 {
00314   CharString fexp;
00315   fexp.printf("_ans=(%s%s);",exp0,exp1);
00316   luaL_dostring(L,fexp());
00317   lua_getglobal(L,"_ans");
00318 }

00320 const char *ConfigReader::getStr(const char *exp,const char *default_val)
00321 {
00322   eval(exp);
00323 
00324   const char *ret = NULL;
00325   if(lua_isstring(L,-1)){
00326     ret = lua_tostring(L,-1);
00327   }else{
00328     printf("ConfigReader: \"%s\" is not a string.\n",exp);
00329     errors++;
00330   }
00331 
00332   lua_pop(L,-1);
00333   return(ret? ret : default_val);
00334 }
00335 
00336 bool ConfigReader::getBool(const char *exp,bool &val)
00337 {
00338   eval(exp);
00339 
00340   bool ok = lua_isboolean(L,-1);
00341   if(ok){
00342     val = (bool)lua_toboolean(L,-1);
00343   }else{
00344     printf("ConfigReader: \"%s\" is not a boolean.\n",exp);
00345     errors++;
00346   }
00347 
00348   lua_pop(L,-1);
00349   return(ok);
00350 }

00352 bool ConfigReader::getInt(const char *exp,int &val)
00353 {
00354   eval(exp);
00355 
00356   bool ok = lua_isnumber(L,-1);
00357   if(ok){
00358     val = (int)rint(lua_tonumber(L,-1));
00359   }else{
00360     printf("ConfigReader: \"%s\" is not an integer.\n",exp);
00361     errors++;
00362   }
00363 
00364   lua_pop(L,-1);
00365   return(ok);
00366 }
00367 
00368 bool ConfigReader::getUInt(const char *exp,unsigned int &val)
00369 {
00370   eval(exp);
00371   
00372   bool ok = lua_isnumber(L,-1);
00373   if(ok){
00374     val = (int)rint(lua_tonumber(L,-1));
00375     if(val<0){
00376       printf("ConfigReader: \"%s\" is not an unsigned integer.\n",exp);
00377       errors++;
00378       ok = false;
00379     }
00380   }else{
00381     printf("ConfigReader: \"%s\" is not an integer.\n",exp);
00382     errors++;
00383   }
00384   
00385   lua_pop(L,-1);
00386   return(ok);
00387 }

00405 bool ConfigReader::getReal(const char *exp,double &val)

00409   bool ok = lua_isnumber(L,-1);
00410   if(ok){

00412   }else{
00413     printf("ConfigReader: \"%s\" is not a real number.\n",exp);

00420 
00421 bool ConfigReader::getInt(const char *exp,int &val,int _min,int _max)
00422 {
00423   if(!getInt(exp,val)) return(false);
00424   if(val<_min || val>_max){
00425     printf("ConfigReader: %s=%d is out of range [%d,%d].\n",
00426            exp,val,_min,_max);
00427     val = bound(val,_min,_max);
00428     errors++;
00429     return(false);
00430   }
00431   return(true);
00432 }
00433 
00434 bool ConfigReader::getPosReal(const char *exp,float &val)
00435 {
00436   if(!getReal(exp,val)) return(false);
00437   if(val <= 0.0){
00438     printf("ConfigReader: %s=%f is non-positive\n",exp,val);
00439     val = 1E-6;
00440     errors++;
00441     return(false);
00442   }
00443   return(true);
00444 }
00445 
00446 bool ConfigReader::getPosReal(const char *exp,double &val)
00447 {
00448   
00449   if(!getReal(exp,val)){ 
00450     printf("failure at %s\n",exp);
00451     return(false);
00452   }
00453   if(val <= 0.0){
00454     printf("ConfigReader: %s=%f is non-positive\n",exp,val);
00455     val = 1E-6;
00456     errors++;
00457     return(false);
00458   }
00459   return(true);
00460 }
00461

00488 bool ConfigReader::set(const char *name,int val)
00489 {
00490   CharString fexp;
00491   fexp.printf("%s=%d;",name,val);
00492   luaL_dostring(L,fexp());
00493 
00494   int v;
00495   return(getInt(name,v) && v==val);
00496 }
00497 
00498 bool ConfigReader::set(const char *name,double val)
00499 {
00500   CharString fexp;
00501   fexp.printf("%s=%f;",name,val);
00502   luaL_dostring(L,fexp());
00503 
00504   double v;
00505   return(getReal(name,v) && fabs(val-v)<1E-9);
00506 }

00508 void ConfigReader::addStandard()
00509 {
00510   // standard includes for a project go here
00511   addFile("config/common.cfg");
00512 }
